hero.title: Search & AI
hero.description: The first Brazilian community dedicated to search technology and artificial intelligence

links.linkedin: Visit the Search & AI Meetup BR LinkedIn page
links.email: Send an email to Search & AI Meetup BR
links.meetup: Visit the Search & AI Meetup BR group on Meetup

about.description: We are a community created to bring together professionals, students, and researchers interested in Search, AI, and related technologies. Our goal is to build an open, collaborative, and accessible space where knowledge circulates and grows through collective participation.

explore.title: Explore Search & AI
explore.description: Discuss search systems, ranking, information retrieval, embeddings, LLMs, and how AI is increasingly transforming products.

share.title: Share and learn
share.description: Exchange real-world learnings and experiences from both industry and research, fostering a dynamic environment of knowledge sharing.

connect.title: Connect people
connect.description: Encourage networking and build an active technical community through in-person and online meetups.

speaker.title: Become a Speaker
speaker.description: Do you have an interesting event, a success story, or a cool idea about Search, Data, or Artificial Intelligence? Submit your proposal and help shape our upcoming meetups.

local.title: Help us find a venue
local.description: Do you know companies or spaces that could host our meetup in São Paulo? Let us know and help make the event happen.

codeOfCondute.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfCondute.description: To ensure our community is a safe, respectful, and welcoming space, we follow a Code of Conduct that guides behavior at all our events, both online and in person.
codeOfCondute.button: Read the full Code of Conduct

inclusion.title: Inclusive community
inclusion.description: We value diversity of backgrounds, experiences, and knowledge levels. We do not tolerate discrimination, harassment, or exclusion of any kind.

respect.title: Respect above all
respect.description: We expect respectful interactions, active listening, and constructive technical discussions focused on ideas — never on people.

security.title: Safe environment
security.description: We promote a safe space for knowledge exchange, where abusive behavior, threats, or privacy violations are not tolerated.

codeOfCondutePage.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfCondutePage.description: Search & AI Meetup BR is a community created to promote knowledge sharing, learning, and collaboration around Information Retrieval, Search Engineering, and applied Artificial Intelligence. We want everyone to feel welcome, safe, and respected in our spaces — both online and in person.
codeOfCondutePage.intro: To achieve this, we have established this Code of Conduct, which applies to all participants, speakers, organizers, and partners.

sections.title: Our community is for everyone
sections.text: We value the participation of people from different backgrounds, experiences, knowledge levels, and paths. We do not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on — but not limited to:

sections.title: Be respectful
points: Treat others with respect and kindness
Listen actively and allow all voices to be heard
Recognize that technical disagreements are normal but do not justify rude behavior

sections.title: Unacceptable behavior
sections.text: The following behaviors are considered unacceptable:
points: Use of sexualized language or imagery in talks, groups, or materials

sections.title: Safe spaces are also welcoming spaces
sections.text: We aim to create an environment where:
points: Feedback is constructive and directed at ideas, not people

sections.title: In case of an issue
sections.text: If you experience or witness any inappropriate behavior, please contact the organizing team immediately. At in-person events, organizers will be identifiable and available to speak discreetly and safely.

sections.title: Consequences and actions
sections.text: The organization may take actions such as:
points: Removal from in-person events without refund
Contacting partners or authorities in serious cases
sections.footer: Decisions will be made based on the collective well-being.

sections.title: Our commitment
sections.text: We, the organizers of Search & AI Meetup BR, commit to:
points: Applying this Code of Conduct consistently and fairly
Creating increasingly inclusive events and spaces
Cultivating an open, diverse, and respectful community

conclusion: By joining our online groups and participating in meetups, everyone agrees to this Code of Conduct.
Thank you for being part of Search & AI Meetup BR!

footer.description: The first Brazilian community dedicated to search technology and artificial intelligence
